mapper.select: select p.pno, p.titl, p.pric, p.content, p.sdt, p.edt, p.tno, t.spono, t.comaddr, p.lat, p.lng, (((6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(p.lat))*cos(radians(p.lng) -radians(#{lon}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(p.lat)))))*1000) AS meter from promotion p inner join tcher t on p.tno = t.tno having meter < 3000 ORDER BY meter LIMIT 0,3000

SELECT p.pno, p.titl, t.tno, m.name, t.comaddr, p.content, p.lng, p.lat, t.spono, t.introduction, (((6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(p.lat))*cos(radians(p.lng) -radians(#{lon}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(p.lat)))))*1000) AS meter FROM memb m left join tcher t on t.tno = m.mno left join promotion p on p.tno = t.tno GROUP BY m.id having meter < 3000 ORDER BY meter LIMIT 0,3000

SELECT p.pno, p.titl, t.tno, m.name, t.comaddr, p.content, p.lng, p.lat, t.spono, t.introduction, (((6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(p.lat))*cos(radians(p.lng) -radians(#{lon}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(p.lat)))))*1000) AS meter FROM memb m left join tcher t on t.tno = m.mno left join promotion p on p.tno = t.tno GROUP BY m.id having meter < 3000 ORDER BY meter LIMIT 0,3000
mapper.insert: insert into promotion(titl, pric, content, tno, lat, lng, sdt, edt) values( #{title}, #{pric}, #{content}, #{tno}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{sdt}, #{edt})
mapper.select: select * from promotion where pno < #{lastNo} and pno > #{lastNo}-6 and pno > 0 order by pno desc
select p.pno, p.titl, t.spono, p.content, p.sdt, p.edt, p.pric from promotion p inner join tcher t on p.tno = t.tno where pno > 0 order by pno desc limit 0, 6;
select p.titl, p.sdt, p.edt, p.pric, t.company, t.comaddr, t.comdetailaddr, p.content, p.tno, p.lat, p.lng from promotion p inner join tcher t on p.tno = t.tno where pno = #{no}
